page.title: 06MALVERN HILLS COLLEGE
page.content: {The Wyvern Trust}is a registered charitable Trust formed to foster a wide range of adult education and community activitie.Foremost among its concerns is the survival and growth of the{Malvern Hills College for Adult {Education.} In 1982 local government spending cuts threatened to close the college. To prevent this the{Trust}entered into an agreement to rent the buildings and equipment from the County Council for a peppercorn rent, finance also comes through a yearly County Council grant. The college offers{day}and{evening} courses in: painting, drawing, ceramics, pottery, sculpture, hobbies and skills, cookery, fashion and allied crafts,keeping fit, languages, secretarial skills, computers and mathematics.
